title: Mayura Kundanalu: Peacock-Inspired Polki Jhumka Earrings
materials: and high-quality cubic zirconia (CZ) accents. Featuring a Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting shine and finish.
features: These stunning Jhumka earrings feature a traditional peacock (Mayura) design. The ornate design is embedded with polki stones which are all meticulously placed. The jhumkas are suspended with embellished gold domes and feature intricate floral and vine-like designs. A vibrant Emerald gemstone sits as the focal point.
colors: Dominantly gold with accents of green and red.
occasions: and other special occasions. Perfect for a traditional Telugu bride's attire.
description: This magnificent piece is handcrafted, combining South Indian traditions with exquisite materials. A true embodiment of timeless elegance. The rich Hyderabadi polish ensures longevity and enduring brilliance, perfect for celebrating the rich heritage of Telugu culture. These earrings add a touch of regal splendor.
